original_title: Incontinence: A Diarrhetic Flow of Mismatches
overview: The editing strategies parallel the personal relationships depicted, and a mismatched cut is literally only the other side of a mismatched couple. Rarely have sound, image and the spatio-temporal coordinates of narrative illusion been buffeted about so vigorously.
title: Incontinence: A Diarrhetic Flow of Mismatches
